title: Master Ninja
desc:
*"I'm not a weaboo, I swear!" I'll slit your throat if you keep saying that!*

This tricky foe will parry you the first time you try to attack it, nullifying your attack and adding the damage you would have dealt to its own next attack.

If possible, avoid bringing a really high damage weapon, so that its initial attack isn't nearly so deadly. Alternatively, because it can only parry you once, you can dodge or stun it to waste its bonus damage. It also can't parry damage from items.
